Actions.Name: When a guest is invited
Actions.Description: This trigger is executed when an invite is created in Guest

Actions.Name: When a guest signs in
Actions.Description: This action will trigger when a guest signs in, either at an iPad or in the Guest web interface

Actions.Name: When a guest signs out
Actions.Description: This operation is triggered when a guest signs out

Actions.Name: When a guest triggers a watchlist
Actions.Description: This action will fire when a guest is flagged on a watchlist
